BillingMilestonePlanItem.name: BillingMilestonePlanItem
BillingMilestonePlanItem.description: Represents a specific billing milestone within the billing milestone plan that’s used to manage and track billing based on the completion of certain deliverables or stages.

BillingMilestonePlanId.description: The billing milestone plan associated with the billing milestone plan item.

BillingScheduleGroupId.description: The billing schedule group that's related to the billing milestone plan item. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

CommencementDate.description: The action that triggers the start of the billing milestone plan for a date-based milestone.

CommencementDateOffset.description: The offset applied to the commencement date to determine the milestone achievement date for a date-based milestone.

CommencementDateOffsetUnit.description: The unit of time for the commencement date offset.

Description.description: Additional details about the billing milestone plan item.

FlatAmount.description: The amount in terms of units of currency, such as $10 or $21.52, to invoice from the order item. Used only when Type field has a value of FlatAmount.

IsMilestoneAccomplished.description: Required. Indicates whether the billing treatment is for milestone billing (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a billing milestone plan item record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a billing milestone plan item record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the billing milestone plan item record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the billing milestone plan item record itself.

MilestoneAccomplishmentDate.description: The date the milestone is achieved for date-based milestones. For event-based milestones, this field indicates the date when the milestone is manually marked as completed.

MilestoneAmount.description: The amount that’s billed when the milestone is reached or completed.

MilestoneType.description: The milestone type for the billing treatment item.

Name.description: Required. The name of the billing milestone plan item.

Percentage.description: The percentage,such as 10% or 12.5%, to invoice from the order item. Used only when Type field has a value of Percentage.

ServicePeriodEnd.description: The end date of the service associated with the milestone.

ServicePeriodStart.description: The start date of the service associated with the milestone.

Status.description: The status of the billing milestone plan item.

Type.description: Required. Specifies whether billing schedules created from this billing treatment item are based on a flat amount or a percentage of the order item's total amount.
